articles.author: Darko Janjevic
articles.title: Trump's cuts hit Voice of America, Radio Free Europe - DW (English)
articles.description: Voice of America employees were placed on administrative leave as the Trump administration cut grants to publicly-funded US outlets broadcasting into Russia, China and North Korea.
articles.content: Workers at Voice of America (VOA) received an email on Saturday placing them on paid administrative leave "until otherwise notified" and instructing them not to enter the VOA offices or access its in… [+2369 chars]
